item.title: 报告显示，美国消费者正感受到通胀和利率带来的压力
item.description: 美国信用评分公司费尔-艾萨克公司（Fair Isaac Corporation）周二表示，由于通货膨胀和利率上调影响了借款人的经济承受能力，导致借款人的经济压力增大，一些美国消费者正显示出越来越多的压力迹象。【原文：Some U.S. consumers are showing increased signs of stress as inflation and higher interest rates are affecting affordability and leading to financial strain on borrowers, credit scoring company Fair Isaac Corporation , widely known as FICO, said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 特朗普与习近平会谈后，美国财长预计将达成最终嘀嗒协议
item.description: 美国财政部长斯科特-贝森特（Scott Bessent）周二表示，他预计美国总统唐纳德-特朗普周五与中国领导人习近平通话时将就短视频应用 TikTok 达成最终协议。【原文：U.S. Treasury Secretary Scott Bessent said on Tuesday he anticipated a final deal on the short-video app TikTok when President Donald Trump speaks with Chinese leader Xi Jinping on Friday.】

item.title: 国防部长称丹麦可能购买波音飞机用于北极监控
item.description: 丹麦国防部长周二表示，丹麦军方可能会购买一支波音 P-8 潜艇猎杀海上巡逻机机队，以帮助加强对法罗群岛和格陵兰岛的监视。【原文：Denmark's defence minister said on Tuesday the country's military may buy a fleet of Boeing P-8 submarine-hunting maritime patrol aircraft to help boost the surveillance of the Faroe Islands and Greenland.】

item.title: 美国财长贝森特在美联储主席人选中称赞布拉德
item.description: 美国财政部长斯科特-贝森特（Scott Bessent）周二表示，他与前美联储官员詹姆斯-布拉德（James Bullard）进行了一次很好的会谈，这是他寻找美联储新主席的工作之一。【原文：U.S. Treasury Secretary Scott Bessent said on Tuesday he had a good session with former Fed official James Bullard as part of his search for a new Fed chairman.】

item.title: 美国对超过 17.4 万辆特斯拉 Model Y 汽车的门把手故障报告进行评估
item.description: 美国国家公路交通安全管理局周二表示，已开始对约174290辆特斯拉Model Y汽车的电子门把手失灵报告进行初步评估。【原文：The U.S. National Highway Traffic Safety Administration said on Tuesday it had opened a preliminary evaluation into about 174,290 Tesla Model Y cars over reports of their electronic door handles becoming inoperative.】

item.title: 英国付费电视集团天空电视台将裁员约 600 人
item.description: 一位熟悉内情的人士周二表示，康卡斯特（Comcast）旗下的英国付费电视集团天空电视台（Sky）将裁员约 600 人，因为该公司将完成为期三年的产品和平台投资。【原文：Sky, the British pay-TV group owned by Comcast , will cut around 600 jobs as the company completes a three-year period of investment in its product and platforms, a person familiar with the matter said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 花旗银行预测以太币年底目标价为 4,300 美元
item.description: 花旗集团将全球第二大加密货币以太坊的年终目标价定为 4300 美元，理由是投资者的需求以及对稳定币和代币化等基于以太坊的用例日益增长的兴趣。【原文：Citigroup has set a year-end price target of $4,300 for ether, the world's second-largest cryptocurrency, citing investor demand and growing interest in ethereum-based use cases such as stablecoins and tokenization.】

item.title: 日经新闻》称，由于电池短缺，日产减少了新聆风的产量计划
item.description: 日经商业日报》（Nikkei business daily）周二称，由于电池采购延迟，日产汽车已将其新款聆风电动车 9-11 月份的生产计划下调了一半以上。【原文：Nissan Motor has revised down its production plan for the new model of its Leaf electric vehicle by more than half for September-November due to delays in battery procurement, the Nikkei business daily said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 早间竞价：美元受到美联储热捧
item.description: 当今美国和全球市场的重要事件【原文：What matters in U.S. and global markets today】

item.title: 中国恒大清算人被任命为创始人资产接管人
item.description: 香港高等法院在周二的一项裁决中表示，中国恒大集团的清算人已获委任，以确认和保全创始人许家印的资产。【原文：China Evergrande Group's liquidators have been appointed to identify and preserve the assets of founder Hui Ka Yan, the Hong Kong High Court said in a ruling on Tuesday.】

item.title: 英国监管机构调查 Global Payments 以 240 亿美元收购 Worldpay 的交易
item.description: 英国竞争与市场管理局（CMA）周二对环球支付公司（Global Payments）斥资 242.5 亿美元收购世界支付公司（Worldpay）一事展开合并调查，评估该交易是否可能削弱英国市场的竞争。【原文：Britain' Competition and Markets Authority (CMA) on Tuesday launched a merger inquiry into Global Payments' $24.25 billion acquisition of Worldpay, assessing whether the deal could potentially lessen competition in UK markets.】

item.title: 得克萨斯州的一家炼油厂如何将破坏亚马逊的牛变成 "绿色 "航空燃料
item.description: 根据路透社对政府跟踪数据、采访和目击者描述的审查，一家为美国航空公司供应绿色燃料的得克萨斯州炼油厂一直在购买来自亚马逊雨林非法开垦土地上饲养的牛的动物脂肪。【原文：A Texas refinery that supplies green fuel to U.S. airlines has been purchasing animal fat from cattle raised on illegally cleared lands in the Amazon rainforest, according to a Reuters review of government tracking data, interviews and eyewitness accounts.】

item.title: 华尔街和美国企业为更多关税动荡做好准备
item.description: 最高法院即将就关税是否符合宪法做出裁决，这可能会使美国企业陷入混乱，并引发对国家财政健康的质疑。【原文：Wall Street is bracing for another bumpy ride ahead of a forthcoming Supreme Court decision on the constitutionality of tariffs that could throw Corporate America into turmoil and raise questions over the country's fiscal health.】

item.title: 礼来减肥药可能在年底前获得 FDA 批准
item.description: 几位华尔街分析师说，礼来公司的实验性减肥药可能会在美国食品药品管理局最近启动的一到两个月的审查程序中得到快速审批。【原文：Eli Lilly 's experimental weight-loss pill could be fast-tracked under a one- to two-month review process recently launched by the U.S. Food and Drug Administration, several Wall Street analysts said.】

item.title: 美联储降息的乐观情绪令债券投资者关注期限和更陡峭的收益率曲线
item.description: 由于预计美联储将在暂停九个月后于本周降息，债券投资者正在买入10年期以下的较长期债券，并加大了对收益率曲线陡峭化的押注。【原文：Bond investors are buying longer-term maturities up to 10-year debt and ramping up bets on a steeper yield curve, anticipating that the Federal Reserve will cut interest rates this week after a nine-month pause.】

item.title: 从 Alphabet 到 Visa，美国巨头推动欧元债券大涨
item.description: 美国公司正在排队用欧元借贷，今年迄今为止的债券销售额达到了创纪录的 1,000 亿美元，这反映了欧洲具有吸引力的融资条件，以及发行人和投资者越来越愿意从美元转向欧元。【原文：U.S. companies are lining up to borrow in euros with bond sales hitting a record $100 billion so far this year, reflecting attractive European funding conditions and a growing willingness among issuers and investors to shift away from the dollar.】

item.title: 美联储暂时避免对独立性造成冲击，库克将出席会议；米兰确认出任空缺席位
item.description: 美国中央银行将于周二召开为期两天的政策会议，虽然暂时躲过了美国总统有史以来首次罢免美联储现任理事的努力，但仍面临着来自白宫的前所未有的压力，要求将货币政策更多地置于行政部门的直接影响之下。【原文：The U.S. central bank opens a two-day policy meeting on Tuesday having skirted, for now, a first-ever effort by the U.S. President to remove a sitting Fed governor, but still facing unprecedented pressure from the White House to bring monetary policy more under the direct influence of the executive branch.】

item.title: Meta 将在 "连接"（Connect）年度盛会上首次推出成本更低的带显示屏的智能眼镜
item.description: 尽管 Meta 公司在其社交媒体平台上处理儿童安全问题时面临着严格审查，但预计该公司将在周三举行的年度 Connect 活动上推出新款智能眼镜，加倍努力开发人工智能增强现实产品。【原文：Meta is expected to double down on AI-powered augmented reality products with new smart glasses at its annual Connect event on Wednesday, even as the company faces scrutiny over its handling of child safety on its social media platforms.】

item.title: 美国期货因美联储降息预期而上扬；零售销售数据拭目以待
item.description: 在上一交易日 S&P 500 指数和纳斯达克指数创下收盘纪录新高之后，周二美国股指期货逐步走高，原因是投资者对美联储本周晚些时候的降息仍抱有期望。【原文：U.S. stock index futures inched higher on Tuesday after the S&P 500 and the Nasdaq closed at record highs in the previous session, as investors remained expectant about interest rate cuts from the Federal Reserve later this week.】

item.title: 文件显示，越航将在长期延误后接收首架波音 737 MAX 飞机
item.description: 越南越捷航空公司（VietJet）的公司和国家文件显示，在下订单九年多之后，该公司将接收其首架波音 737 MAX 飞机，而河内正继续与美国就关税问题进行谈判。【原文：Vietnamese airline VietJet is set to take delivery of its first Boeing 737 MAX aircraft more than nine years after placing an order, company and state documents show, as Hanoi continues talks with the U.S. on tariffs.】

item.title: 福特将在德国科隆电动汽车工厂裁员 1000 人
item.description: 美国汽车制造商福特公司周二在一份声明中表示，由于需求疲软，该公司将在德国科隆市的电动汽车生产部门裁员多达 1000 人。【原文：Ford will cut up to 1,000 jobs in electric car production in the German city of Cologne due to weak demand, the U.S. carmaker said in a statement on Tuesday.】

item.title: Databricks 参股 Indicium，首次投资拉美初创企业
item.description: Databricks 收购了数据和人工智能咨询公司 Indicium 的少数股份。【原文：Databricks has acquired a minority stake in data and artificial intelligence consultancy Indicium, the companies said on Tuesday, marking the San Francisco-based firm's first investment in a startup founded in Latin America.】

item.title: 消息人士称，中国腾讯计划发行等值 10 亿美元的点心债券
item.description: 据两位直接知情的消息人士透露，中国游戏和社交媒体领军企业腾讯控股正计划通过三期离岸人民币债券交易筹集相当于 10 亿美元的资金。【原文：Chinese gaming and social media leader Tencent Holdings is aiming to raise the equivalent of $1 billion in a three-tranche offshore yuan bond deal, according to two sources with direct knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: 独家报道消息人士称，英伟达面向中国市场推出的全新 RTX6000D 芯片并未受到大型企业的青睐
item.description: 两位了解采购讨论情况的人士说，英伟达为中国市场量身定制的最新人工智能芯片RTX6000D需求冷淡，一些大型科技公司选择不下单。【原文：Nvidia's RTX6000D, its newest artificial intelligence chip tailored for the Chinese market, has seen only lukewarm demand with some major tech firms opting not to place orders, two people with knowledge of procurement discussions said.】

item.title: 美国国家公路交通安全管理局（NHTSA）称，Stellantis将因燃油泵问题召回超过5.3万辆美国汽车
item.description: 美国国家公路交通安全管理局（NHTSA）周二表示，克莱斯勒旗下的斯泰兰特公司因燃油泵问题在美国召回53849辆汽车，该问题可能导致燃油流量损失和驱动力损失。【原文：Chrysler-owner Stellantis is recalling 53,849 vehicles in the U.S. due to an issue with fuel pump, which can result in a loss of fuel flow and loss of drive power, the National Highway Traffic Safety Administration (NHTSA) said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 全球投资退缩，澳大利亚推迟首次海上风电拍卖
item.description: 澳大利亚维多利亚州以全球投资障碍为由，推迟了海上风电场的首次融资拍卖，这对该国从燃煤发电向可再生能源转型至关重要的产业来说是一个挫折。【原文：Australia's Victoria state has postponed its inaugural auction for offshore wind farm funding, citing global investment hurdles, in a setback to an industry deemed vital to the country's transition from coal-fired power to renewable energy.】

item.title: 英美资源集团与 Codelco 敲定 50 亿美元智利铜矿交易
item.description: 英美资源集团（Anglo American）和智利国营铜业巨头Codelco公司（COBRE.UL）周二称，双方已敲定联合运营邻近智利矿山的协议，旨在释放至少50亿美元的价值。【原文：Anglo American and Chilean state-run copper giant Codelco (COBRE.UL) said on Tuesday they have finalised an agreement to jointly operate their neighbouring Chilean mines, aiming to unlock at least $5 billion in value.】

item.title: 新任首席执行官努诺-马托斯（Nuno Matos）清理门户，澳新银行投资者做好短期阵痛的准备
item.description: 澳新银行集团（ANZ Group）的投资者愿意支持新任首席执行官努诺-马托斯（Nuno Matos）重振这家澳大利亚银行颓势的战略，但他们正准备应对近期的打击，包括可能的股息削减。【原文：ANZ Group investors are willing to back new CEO Nuno Matos' strategy to resuscitate the Australian bank's flagging fortunes, but they are gearing up for near-term hits, including a possible dividend cut.】

item.title: 澳大利亚央行高层表示，随着规模扩大，澳大利亚养老基金将扩大外汇套期保值的使用范围
item.description: 澳大利亚央行的一位高级官员周二表示，澳大利亚养老基金将不得不扩大外汇对冲的使用范围，因为该行业的规模可能会扩大，成为全球第二大行业，海外投资的份额也会增加。【原文：Australian pension funds will have to expand the use of foreign exchange hedging as the sector is likely to grow in size to become the second-largest globally with a larger share of investments going abroad, a top central banker said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 中国钢材出口有望再创新高，面临关税进一步反弹的风险
item.description: 今年，中国的钢铁出口量将创下历史新高，打破了前所未有的贸易壁垒将导致出货量下降的预测，并有可能引发针对世界主要生产国的更激烈的保护主义反弹。【原文：China's steel exports are set to hit an all-time high this year, defying predictions that unprecedented trade barriers would drive down shipments, and threaten to provoke an even fiercer protectionist backlash against the world's dominant producer.】
